Question
========

A crime has been committed, and it is known that the criminal is part is part of a population of 6 million. Through research, the police know that only one person in a million has DNA that matches the DNA of the perpetrator. What then is the probability that the police will catch the perpetrator has, if the police rely only on a DNA match?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/6,000,000
* 1/1,000,000
* 1/6
* 5/6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/6,000,000: Incorrect
* 1/1,000,000: Incorrect
* 1/6: Correct
* 5/6: Incorrect
